ns0:entry.ns0:title: aws-ia/terraform-aws-mwaa
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/aws-ia/terraform-aws-mwaa
Language: hcl
Terraform module for Amazon MWAA(Apache Airflow)

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-aws-tfstate-backend
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-tfstate-backend
Language: hcl
Terraform module that provision an S3 bucket to store the `terraform.tfstate` file and a DynamoDB table to lock the state file to prevent concurrent modifications and state corruption.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
Language: hcl
Terraform module to configure and provision Datadog monitors, custom RBAC roles with permissions, Datadog synthetic tests, Datadog child organizations, and other Datadog resources from a YAML configuration, complete with automated tests.
